summary: This is the Sandbox page for BYOG, it will contain experimental tests before being released into the main version.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[b][color=f08020]
For the Full Version of BYOG go here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18474] BYOG Nexus Page [/url] 
This page is for the experimental tests and will likely be unstable,
It\'s only meant for those who are contributing or with to beta test possibly dangerous settings.
Be careful with your save-game!

** Balance Your Own Game **
BYOG was originally made for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037]my ACE overhaul mod[/url],
but I felt that it would be beneficial to everyone, not just ACE users!

If you like BYOG please have a look at [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037]ACE[/url]!

-Athyra
[/color][/b]


I will keep this section updated with future possibilities:

Currently up for discussion:

- Should BYOG use Script Dragon or SKSE in order to offer more functionality?
- Any suggestions for more features?


[/center]
author: Athyra

files.name: Experimental
files.changelogHtml:
First standalone release.
- Prepared the BYOG to work fully as a standalone mod.
